description.value:
Aura 5

Enemies do not gain the benefits of concealment or total concealment while within the aura.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 3

+37 vs AC; 3d12+12 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+37 vs AC; 2d12+12 damage.

At-Will

Standard

Zenobaal makes two claw attacks and one bite attack. While bloodied, he makes three claw attacks instead of two

At-Will

Immediate Reaction

Reach 2

Trigger: When an enemy attacks zenobaal while flanking him, at-will

Targets the triggering enemy and an enemy flanking with the triggering enemy; +37 vs AC; 2d12+12 damage, and the target is pushed 3 squares and knocked prone.

Recharge 4-6 ✦ Cold

Standard

Close blast 5

+34 vs Reflex; 4d12+10 cold damage, and the target gains vulnerable 15 all (save ends) and is knocked prone. Miss: Half damage.

Encounter

Free

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

Breath weapon recharges, and Zenobaal uses it

At-Will ✦ Fear, Psychic

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Ranged 20

+35 vs Will; 2d8+9 psychic damage, and the target is dazed until the end of Zenobaal's next turn. Aftereffect: The target is immune to this effect until the end of Zenobaal's next turn. This attack does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Encounter ✦ Fear

Standard

Close burst 10

Targets enemies; +34 vs Will; the target is dominated until the end of Zenobaal's next turn. Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

Recharge 6

Close blast 3

+34 vs Fortitude; 2d8+10 damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends). Aftereffect: Ongoing 10 damage (save ends). Aftereffect: Ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Zenobaal can make opportunity attacks with his bite against enemies within his reach (3 squares).
Zenobaal makes a saving throw against one ongoing damage effect at the start of his turn.

system.biography:
HP 1240; Bloodied 620 ; see also bloodied breath
Resist 30 cold Immune stunned 		Init +22 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 46Fort 47Ref 45Will 46
Speed 10, fly 10 (hover), overland flight 15
Ability ScoresStr 33 (+28)
Con 30 (+27)		Dex 20 (+22)
Int 26 (+25)		Wis 30 (+27)
Cha 28 (+26)
Languages Supernal; understands all
Alignment Evil
Skills Arcana +30, Dungeoneering +32, History +30, Insight +32, Nature +32, Religion +30Senses Darkvision,Truesight 5
Passive Perception 37 | Insight 42
